item.title: PyTDA
item.description:
Python Turbulence Detection Algorithm

Quick description

This software provides Python functions that will estimate turbulence from Doppler radar data ingested via Py-ART. Specifically, this software will estimate the cubic root of eddy dissipation rate, given input radar data containing reflectivity and spectrum width. Can be done on an individual â€¦
item.dc:creator: nasa
